title: Number of expressways gas stations , by provider in France 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Company is 8.0.
There is a difference of 113.0 between the maximum Company Total and minimum Company Dyneff.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of gas stations in the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Company is 8.0.
There is a difference of 113.0 between the maximum Company Total and minimum Company Dyneff.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
Company Total has the highest Number of gas stations and Dyneff has the lowest Number of gas stations.
Second maximum Number of gas stations is found at Company Avia.
The highest Company Total has 113.0 more Number of gas stations than the lowest Company Dyneff.
Number of gas stations at Company Total is 121.0 , second place is Avia at 72.0, and thirdly is Shell at 69.0.
Company Eni, and Esso have the same Number of gas stations.
The average Number of gas stations in all 9 Companys is 49.22.
